attributes.action: Protest the Trump administrations policy of separating immigrant families.
attributes.additional_details:
It is our obligation as a supposed friend of America to be a good friend and tell them when their moral compass has gone horribly astray from their purported ideals.
It is time for international condemnation of these actions.
attributes.background: The Trump administration is currently separating families who have crossed the border and is detaining several thousand children in unsuitable conditions, including metal cages and  a 'tent city'.
